items.question: Onde meus dados s√£o armazenados?
items.answer: Por padr√£o, todos os seus dados s√£o armazenados localmente no seu dispositivo usando o armazenamento do navegador. Isso significa que seus dados nunca saem do seu dispositivo a menos que voc√™ ative explicitamente o backup na nuvem.

items.answer: Sim! Todos os nossos apps funcionam totalmente offline. Algumas funcionalidades como sincronizar dados do Strava ou obter pre√ßos atuais de a√ß√µes requerem internet, mas a funcionalidade principal funciona sem ela.

items.answer: Se voc√™ limpar os dados do navegador, os dados dos apps ser√£o exclu√≠dos. Recomendamos ativar o backup na nuvem ou exportar regularmente seus dados para prevenir perda de dados.

items.answer: Sugerimos um pre√ßo baseado no custo de vida da sua regi√£o, mas voc√™ √© livre para pagar mais ou menos. Se voc√™ √© estudante ou enfrenta dificuldades financeiras, sinta-se √† vontade para pagar menos. Se pode pagar mais, sua contribui√ß√£o extra nos ajuda a continuar construindo.

items.answer: Sim! Voc√™ pode fazer upgrade para remover an√∫ncios e desbloquear funcionalidades premium a qualquer momento. Se cancelar sua assinatura, voc√™ mant√©m o acesso at√© o fim do per√≠odo de cobran√ßa, depois volta ao n√≠vel gratuito.

items.answer: O plano Membro Fundador (‚Ç¨599 √∫nico) d√° acesso vital√≠cio a TODOS os apps e TODAS as vers√µes futuras para sempre. Voc√™ tamb√©m tem acesso antecipado a novas funcionalidades, seu nome no nosso Hall da Fama, sess√µes trimestrais de Q&A com o fundador, pedidos de funcionalidades priorit√°rios e suporte direto via Discord. √â limitado aos primeiros 100 membros.

items.question: Voc√™s t√™m um app mobile?
items.answer: Nossos apps web s√£o totalmente responsivos e funcionam muito bem em navegadores mobile. Voc√™ pode at√© instal√°-los como PWAs (Progressive Web Apps) para uma experi√™ncia semelhante a um app.

items.answer: Voc√™ pode nos contatar em support@breathofnow.site ou atrav√©s do formul√°rio de contato. Normalmente respondemos dentro de 24-48 horas.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.subtitle: Your data lives on your device. We can't see it, we can't sell it, we can't lose it. This isn't just a feature‚Äîit's our fundamental principle.
privacyFirst.metaDescription: Your data lives on your device. We can't see it, we can't sell it, we can't lose it.
privacyFirst.howWeProtectSubtitle: Privacy isn't an afterthought‚Äîit's baked into our architecture

localStorage.title: Local-First Storage
localStorage.description: All your data is stored locally in your browser's IndexedDB. No server uploads by default.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: When you enable cloud sync, your data is encrypted before leaving your device.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero Knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: We literally cannot see your data. Even with cloud sync enabled, we only store encrypted blobs.

noTracking.title: No Third-Party Analytics
noTracking.description: We don't use Google Analytics or any invasive tracking. Your usage stays private.

yourControl.title: Your Device, Your Control
yourControl.description: Export your data anytime in standard formats. Delete everything with one click.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Built with European privacy standards in mind. Your rights are protected.

privacyFirst.yourDeviceDesc: All data stored locally in IndexedDB
privacyFirst.cloudOptionalDesc: Encrypted sync for premium users only

cta.title: Ready to Take Back Your Privacy?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who value their data privacy. Start free today.

worksOffline.title: Works Offline
worksOffline.subtitle: No internet? No problem. All apps work fully offline with optional cloud sync. Your productivity doesn't depend on a connection.
worksOffline.metaDescription: No internet? No problem. All apps work fully offline with optional cloud sync.
worksOffline.alwaysAvailableSubtitle: Built from the ground up to work offline, not as an afterthought

trueOffline.title: True Offline Mode
trueOffline.description: All core features work without any internet connection. Track expenses on a flight, log workouts in the mountains.

instantResponse.title: Instant Response
instantResponse.description: No network latency. Your data is right there on your device, ready in milliseconds.

pwa.title: Progressive Web App
pwa.description: Install on your home screen like a native app. Works seamlessly across all devices.

smartSync.title: Smart Sync
smartSync.description: When you're back online, changes sync automatically. No manual intervention needed.

cloudBackup.title: Optional Cloud Backup
cloudBackup.description: Premium users can enable cloud sync for cross-device access while keeping offline functionality.

everywhere.title: Works Everywhere
everywhere.description: From remote beaches to subway tunnels‚Äîyour apps work wherever you are.

step1.title: Data Stored Locally
step1.description: All your data is stored in IndexedDB, a powerful browser database that persists even when offline.

step2.title: Service Worker Magic
step2.description: Our service worker caches the app so it loads instantly, even without network access.

step3.title: Queue Changes
step3.description: When offline, any changes you make are queued and ready to sync when you reconnect.

step4.title: Automatic Sync
step4.description: Back online? Changes sync automatically in the background. No manual steps required.

traveling.title: Traveling
traveling.desc: Track expenses during flights and in areas without coverage

outdoor.title: Outdoor Activities
outdoor.desc: Log workouts in remote hiking trails or mountains

commuting.title: Commuting
commuting.desc: Use apps in subway tunnels with no signal

international.title: International Travel
international.desc: No need for expensive roaming data

poorConnectivity.title: Poor Connectivity
poorConnectivity.desc: Works perfectly in areas with spotty internet

cta.title: Never Depend on a Connection Again
cta.subtitle: Start using apps that respect your independence. Work anywhere, anytime.

beautifullySimple.title: Beautifully Simple
beautifullySimple.subtitle: No bloat, no complexity. Each app does one thing and does it exceptionally well. Design that gets out of your way.
beautifullySimple.metaDescription: No bloat, no complexity. Each app does one thing and does it exceptionally well.
beautifullySimple.designPhilosophySubtitle: We believe the best tools are the ones you don't have to think about

singlePurpose.title: Single Purpose Apps
singlePurpose.description: Each app is focused on doing one thing exceptionally well, rather than being mediocre at many things.

cleanInterface.title: Clean Interface
cleanInterface.description: No cluttered dashboards or overwhelming options. Just what you need, when you need it.

intuitiveDesign.title: Intuitive Design
intuitiveDesign.description: Start using any app immediately without tutorials or documentation. It just works.

fastPerformance.title: Fast Performance
fastPerformance.description: Lightweight apps that load instantly and respond immediately to your interactions.

consistentExperience.title: Consistent Experience

accessibleDesign.title: Accessible Design

lessIsMore.title: Less is More
lessIsMore.desc: We remove features, not add them. Every element must earn its place.

focusOnTask.title: Focus on Task
focusOnTask.desc: The UI disappears when you're working. Your content takes center stage.

noLearningCurve.title: No Learning Curve

respectfulDesign.title: Respectful Design

cta.title: Experience Thoughtful Design
